page.title: 13Gala Activities
page.content: Before the Gala starts flags and floats are made to get ready for the big day. People rush about searching for material and cardboard to make all sorts of costumes. It is a happy day. After dinner we all get dressed up. Now it is time for the Gala Queen to mount her float. Her dress is a clear,white colour. Her little attendants sit on boxes with flowers all around them. The Fancy Dress judging takes place next.All is quiet as the different age groups are judged seperately. Then we parade down though the village behind the band to the field where we are told who the winners are. Next come the races like egg and spoon,running and the wheelbarrow. There are plenty more activities to keep people occupied. At the end of the afternoon is the Fell Race.
